message.content:
在 webtech-monorepo 中搜尋 reseller portal 的 downtime page 或歇業中頁面的實作。

重點找出：
1. downtime page 的 Vue 組件位置
2. 樣式和 UI 結構
3. 如何切換顯示 downtime page（路由或條件渲染）
4. 是否有多品牌版本（VORTEX/Cloudsight）的處理方式

搜尋路徑：packages/app-reseller-portal 和相關目錄

content.text: 我來幫你搜尋 reseller portal 中的 downtime page 實作。讓我從多個角度進行搜索。

content.text: 現在讓我搜索 downtime 相關的關鍵字：
很好！找到了 maintenance page。讓我查看具體的實作：

<template>
  <WrapperPortal>
    <CardTemplatePortal
      class="maintenance-card"
      :title="$t('Maintenance')"
      :subtitle="
        $t('{vendor} {portal} is currently undergoing essential updates and is temporarily unavailable.', {
          vendor: TEXT.CURRENT_COMPANY,
          portal: TEXT.PAGE_TITLE,
        })
      "
    />
  </WrapperPortal>
</template>

<script setup>
import CardTemplatePortal from '@/components/composite/CardTemplatePortal.vue';
import WrapperPortal from '@/components/composite/WrapperPortal.vue';
import { TEXT } from '@/constants/text';
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.maintenance-card {
  --card-title-color: var(--color-danger-default);
  --card-subtitle-color: var(--color-text-primary);

  text-align: center;

  .v-card-text {
    padding: 0;
  }
}
</style>


<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious. If it does, you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer high-level questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

完美！現在讓我查看完整的 App.vue 和路由初始化來了解整體流程：

<template>
  <LayoutWrapper>
    <!-- TODO: use below comment once the layout components are ready -->
    <component :is="LayoutRef">
      <RouterView />
    </component>
  </LayoutWrapper>

  <GlobalNotification
    v-model="globalNotification.isOpen"
    :type="globalNotification.type"
    :closable="globalNotification.closable"
    :message="globalNotification.message"
    :timeout="globalNotification.timeout"
    :component="globalNotification.component"
    @afterLeave="globalNotification.onClose"
  >
    {{ globalNotification.message }}
  </GlobalNotification>

  <DialogConfirm
    v-model="dialog.state.confirm"
    v-bind="confirmDefaultProps"
  />

  <DialogConfirmSapOrderWithApi />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, computed, onMounted, watch } from 'vue';
import { useI18n } from 'vue-i18n';
import { RouterView, useRoute } from 'vue-router';

import Favicon from '@/assets/app/favicon.ico';
import DialogConfirm from '@/components/composite/DialogConfirm.vue';
import GlobalNotification from '@/components/composite/GlobalNotification.vue';
import DialogConfirmSapOrderWithApi from '@/components/feature/DialogConfirmSapOrderWithApi.vue';
import LayoutMain from '@/components/layouts/LayoutMain.vue';
import LayoutPortal from '@/components/layouts/LayoutPortal.vue';
import LayoutWrapper from '@/components/layouts/LayoutWrapper.vue';
import useBooleanToggle from '@/composables/useBooleanToggle';
import { ERROR_NETWORK } from '@/constants/error/internal';
import AbortServiceManager from '@/models/AbortServiceManager';
import { useAccountStore } from '@/stores/account';
import { useAuthStore } from '@/stores/auth';
import { useBreadcrumbStore } from '@/stores/breadcrumb';
import { useEmailStore } from '@/stores/email';
import { useGlobalNotification } from '@/stores/globalNotification';
import { useLicenseStore } from '@/stores/license';
import { useMemberStore } from '@/stores/member';
import { usePartnerStore } from '@/stores/partner';

const globalNotification = useGlobalNotification();

const $route = useRoute();
const $t = useI18n().t;
const memberStore = useMemberStore();
const accountStore = useAccountStore();
const authStore = useAuthStore();
const breadcrumbStore = useBreadcrumbStore();
const emailStore = useEmailStore();
const licenseStore = useLicenseStore();
const partnerStore = usePartnerStore();

const dialog = useBooleanToggle({
  confirm: false,
});

const confirmDefaultProps = ref({
  type: undefined,
  contentTitle: '',
  contentMessage: '',
});

const LayoutRef = computed(() => {
  const layoutName = $route?.meta?.layout || 'LayoutMain';
  const layoutMap = {
    LayoutPortal,
    LayoutMain,
  };
  return layoutMap[layoutName] || LayoutMain;
});

const setFavicon = () => {
  let link = document.querySelector("link[rel~='icon']");
  if (!link) {
    link = document.createElement('link');
    link.rel = 'icon';
    document.head.appendChild(link);
  }
  link.href = Favicon;
};

onMounted(async () => {
  setFavicon();

  /**
   * @typedef {Object} UnhandledRejectionCause
   * @property {string} [extraType] - Extra type of error cause
   * @property {string} message - Error message
   * @property {boolean} [hideNotification] - hide notification
   */

  /**
   * Global unhandled rejection event listener
   * @param {string} message - Error message
   * @param {string} source - Error source
   * @param {number} lineno - Line number
   * @param {number} colno - Column number
   * @param {Error & {cause: UnhandledRejectionCause} } error - Error object
   */
  window.onerror = function (message, source, lineno, colno, error) {
    const cause = error?.cause || null;
    // when extraType is defined but you still want to show notification, provide showNotification: true
    const hideNotification = cause?.hideNotification;

    if (hideNotification || cause?.type === 'abort') {
      return;
    }

    // when network error
    if (cause?.type === ERROR_NETWORK.KEY.NETWORK_ERROR) {
      confirmDefaultProps.value = {
        type: 'error',
        contentTitle: ERROR_NETWORK.INFO.NETWORK_ERROR.I18N_TITLE($t),
        contentMessage: ERROR_NETWORK.INFO.NETWORK_ERROR.I18N_MESSAGE($t),
      };
      dialog.on('confirm');
      return;
    }

    // when cause or extraType is not defined || you don't want to hide notification
    if (!cause?.extraType) {
      globalNotification.error({
        component: 'snackbar',
        message: cause?.message ? cause.message : $t('Something went wrong!'),
      });
    }
  };
});

watch(
  () => authStore.isLogin,
  async (isLogin) => {
    if (!isLogin) {
      accountStore.$reset();
      memberStore.$reset();
      licenseStore.$reset();
      emailStore.$reset();
      partnerStore.$reset();
      breadcrumbStore.$reset();
    } else {
      const { signal } = AbortServiceManager.add('fetchUpstreamPartnerListMock');

      await accountStore.fetchMyInfo();
      await partnerStore.fetchUpstreamPartnerListMock({ signal });
      AbortServiceManager.delete('fetchUpstreamPartnerListMock');
    }
  },
  { immediate: true },
);

watch(
  () => accountStore.user.id,
  (userId) => {
    if (!userId) {
      return;
    }
  },
  { immediate: true },
);
</script>

完美！我已經收集到所有必要的信息。讓我為你整理成完整的報告。

## 🔍 webtech-monorepo Reseller Portal - Downtime Page 實作報告

### 1️⃣ **Downtime Page 的 Vue 組件位置**

**主要文件：**
- **Vue 組件**: `/Users/liuhanwen/Desktop/project/webtech-monorepo/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/pages/maintenance/index.vue`

**組件層次結構：**
```
maintenance/index.vue
├── WrapperPortal (容器組件)
│   └── CardTemplatePortal (卡片模板)
```

### 2️⃣ **樣式和 UI 結構**

**maintenance/index.vue 的實現：**
```vue
<template>
  <WrapperPortal>
    <CardTemplatePortal
      class="maintenance-card"
      :title="$t('Maintenance')"
      :subtitle="
        $t('{vendor} {portal} is currently undergoing essential updates and is temporarily unavailable.', {
          vendor: TEXT.CURRENT_COMPANY,
          portal: TEXT.PAGE_TITLE,
        })
      "
    />
  </WrapperPortal>
</template>

<style lang="scss">
.maintenance-card {
  --card-title-color: var(--color-danger-default);  // 紅色標題
  --card-subtitle-color: var(--color-text-primary);
  text-align: center;
  
  .v-card-text {
    padding: 0;
  }
}
</style>
```

**UI 組件詳解：**

1. **WrapperPortal** (`/src/components/composite/WrapperPortal.vue`)
   - 提供居中、靈活的容器佈局
   - 寬度固定 480px，最大 100%
   - 帶有陰影效果 (`shadow-center-02`)
   - 淺色主題 (`theme-light`)

2. **CardTemplatePortal** (`/src/components/composite/CardTemplatePortal.vue`)
   - 圓角卡片設計
   - 支持 title、subtitle、body、footer 插槽
   - 標題顏色可自訂（維護頁面設為危險紅色）
   - 內部使用 BaseCard 組件

### 3️⃣ **如何切換顯示 Downtime Page**

#### **路由配置** (`/src/router/routes/common.routes.js`)

```javascript
{
  path: '/maintenance',
  name: PATH_NAME.KEY.MAINTENANCE,
  component: () => import('@/pages/maintenance/index.vue'),
  meta: {
    layout: 'LayoutPortal',
    isAccessDenied: import.meta.env.VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE !== 'true',  // 控制路由可訪問性
  },
}
```

#### **路由守衛邏輯** (`/src/router/action.js`)

```javascript
const RouterActions = {
  beforeEach: async (to) => {
    const isMaintenanceMode = import.meta.env.VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE === 'true';

    // 當啟用維護模式時
    if (isMaintenanceMode) {
      // 如果不是訪問維護頁面，則重定向到維護頁面
      if (to.name !== PATH_NAME.KEY.MAINTENANCE) {
        return { name: PATH_NAME.KEY.MAINTENANCE };
      } else {
        return true;
      }
    }

    // 如果路由被標記為 isAccessDenied，則重定向到 404
    if (isAccessDenied) {
      return { name: PATH_NAME.KEY.NOT_FOUND };
    }
    
    // ... 其他認證邏輯
  }
};
```

#### **環境變數控制**

設置 `VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE=true` 即可啟用維護模式：

- 在 `.env.local` 中：`VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE=true`
- 或在 CI/CD 部署腳本中設置（見 `amplify-headless-init.sh`）

```bash
# amplify-headless-init.sh
if [ -n "$IS_MAINTENANCE" ]; then
  echo "VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE=$IS_MAINTENANCE" >> ./.env.local
fi
```

### 4️⃣ **多品牌版本處理方式（VORTEX vs Cloudsight/MarchNetworks）**

#### **TEXT 常量的多租戶實現**

**VORTEX 版本** (`/src/constants/text.js`)
```javascript
const company = 'VORTEX';

export const TEXT = Object.freeze({
  CURRENT_COMPANY: company,      // 'VORTEX'
  VENDOR_NAME: 'VIVOTEK',
  PAGE_TITLE: 'RESELLER PORTAL(LICENSE PORTAL)',
  VENDOR: import.meta.env.VITE_VENDOR_NAME,
});
```

**MarchNetworks/CloudSight 版本** (`/src/tenants/mn/constants/text.js`)
```javascript
const company = 'March Networks CloudSight';

export const TEXT = Object.freeze({
  CURRENT_COMPANY: company,      // 'March Networks CloudSight'
  VENDOR_NAME: 'MarchNetworks',
  PAGE_TITLE: 'RESELLER PORTAL',  // 不含 (LICENSE PORTAL)
  VENDOR: import.meta.env.VITE_VENDOR_NAME,
});
```

#### **環境變數配置的品牌區分**

維護頁面顯示的訊息格式：
```
"{vendor} {portal} is currently undergoing essential updates and is temporarily unavailable."
```

實際顯示效果：
- **VORTEX**: "VORTEX RESELLER PORTAL(LICENSE PORTAL) is currently undergoing essential updates and is temporarily unavailable."
- **MarchNetworks**: "March Networks CloudSight RESELLER PORTAL is currently undergoing essential updates and is temporarily unavailable."

#### **環境文件配置** (`/.env.prod`, `/.env.prod.marchnetworks`)

```bash
# VORTEX 版本
VITE_VENDOR_NAME=Vivotek
VITE_APP_VORTEX_DOMAIN=portal.vortexcloud.com

# MarchNetworks 版本
VITE_VENDOR_NAME=MarchNetworks
VITE_APP_VORTEX_DOMAIN=cloudsight.marchnetworks.com
```

#### **多租戶路由結構**

- **基礎路由**: `/src/router/routes/` (共用於所有租戶)
- **租戶特定路由**: `/src/tenants/mn/router/routes/` (MarchNetworks 專用)

MarchNetworks 租戶也有相同的路由守衛邏輯 (`/src/tenants/mn/router/action.js`)

### 5️⃣ **翻譯支持**

維護頁面支持多語言，翻譯文件位置：
- `/src/locales/languages/English.json`
- `/src/locales/languages/TradChinese.json` (維護: "維護")
- `/src/locales/languages/Japanese.json`

### 📋 **完整流程圖**

```
啟動應用 → 路由初始化
    ↓
檢查 VITE_IS_MAINTENANCE 環境變數
    ↓
    ├─ true → 攔截所有路由 → 重定向到 /maintenance
    │           ↓
    │       顯示維護頁面
    │       (使用多品牌 TEXT 常量)
    │
    └─ false → 正常路由流程
              ↓
              檢查 isAccessDenied
              ↓
              檢查身份認證
              ↓
              加載相應頁面
```

### 🔧 **關鍵檔案路徑總結**

| 項目 | 路徑 |
|------|------|
| 維護頁面 Vue 組件 | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/pages/maintenance/index.vue` |
| 路由配置 (VORTEX) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/router/routes/common.routes.js` |
| 路由守衛 (VORTEX) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/router/action.js` |
| 路由守衛 (MarchNetworks) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/tenants/mn/router/action.js` |
| TEXT 常量 (VORTEX) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/constants/text.js` |
| TEXT 常量 (MarchNetworks) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/tenants/mn/constants/text.js` |
| 環境變數 (VORTEX 開發) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/.env.dev` |
| 環境變數 (MarchNetworks 開發) | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/.env.dev.marchnetworks` |
| 翻譯檔案 | `/packages/app-reseller-portal/src/locales/languages/` |
